transcript.text:
￼


















Designer Market Place
Designer Front Store

3 min
check how your customers can see the profile of your designers, purchase designs, and more showcase your designers' profiles in a manner they are visible to your audience personalize designers' landing pages along with the individual designer designer page links note the below section will only appear if the designer option is public if it is set for admin only then these links will not appear to add a link showing all the designers on your website at the front store, go to admin >> store personalization >> links header/footer >> +add button here, under all links, you’ll find 3 new links available – top designers, designers, and list of all designers top designers – this will only show the list of all the top selling designers in the form of the dropdown website designers – it will show all the designers list in the form of a dropdown designers – the designer page will show all the designers along with their designs created the designs will have their nickname added customer can click on any of the designer’s profile to view their landing page the designers’ landing page includes their bio and all the designs created by them every design here has a customize button that will redirect the customer on the designer studio page
Did this page help you?
